text: “apage deviyane! oba ovunta porondu vana lada, sthiravu svargayanhi ovungenda, ovunge mutun mittangenda, ovunge bharyayavangenda, ovunge paramparave daruvangenda vu honda ayavada ætulu karanu mænava! niyata vasayenma obama (siyallantama) balasampannayeku ha (siyalla danna) gnanavantayeku vasayen sitinnehiya”
